dict.string: Equalizer has been updated to the latest iOS version.

Equalizer has been in the App Store since 2009 and we have been maintaining it for as long. It cost $3.99 since very early on and never increased in price. We are deeply committed to continuing support and maintenance for Equalizer. However, paid apps have received a decisive hit in sales for a series of years now. Instead of requiring subsciptions or other forced payments, we would request a small donation every other year or so to ensure we can keep the doors open on Equalizer. If you continue using Equalizer after many years, please press Donate to reach our Paypal donation site.
